subject: Baseball
Collectors and Collections
lead_paragraph: A Honus Wagner baseball card has been sold for a record $2.8 million, a little more than six months after it was bought for a then-record $2.35 million. Referred to as the Mona Lisa of baseball cards, it is in the best condition of the few known T206 Wagner cards, released in 1909 by the American Tobacco Company. It was purchased by an unidentified private collector.
